item.description: Lo Kai (1655 Lakeview Avenue, Dracut MA) November 16, 2012 beginning at 8:30PM. The Blues Brothers and Elvis will be performing. They are also looking for new Talent (any of the Karaoke crew brave enough for this?) $5.00 cover charge in the lounge (you can also order food up until about 10pm I believe). Show starts at 8:30, look for the meetup sign on the table or ask for Janice so I can introduce you to others in the group.Â  Dancing is encouraged during the performance and there will be a d.j. after the show. They have a large dance floor.
item.name: Lo Kai, Dracut - Blues Brothers\Elvis\Talent Search
